rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A modest lobby area that welcomes visitors with a traditional colonial touch.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and adhere to Vastu principles for sunlight. It includes seating arrangements and decor in line with Colonial aesthetics.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully open plan adjacent to the living room, designed for efficient workflow on a tight budget. Equipped with modern yet cost-effective fixtures and essential appliances.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining space within the open-plan area; can be delineated by subtle partitions or furniture arrangements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with built-in storage and floor-to-ceiling windows, designed for a restful atmosphere while meeting Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed with cost-effective materials, ensuring privacy and proper orientation as per local norms.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom offering basic amenities, ensuring comfort within budgetary constraints.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: A compact area on the ground floor providing private space for house help, with essential facilities and minimal design while maintaining respectful privacy.
